title: Champion Select Chat Bug
body:
Hi, 

I have this problem which is seemingly linked to my account, not my client. Summoners name come up as code when in champ select and in the end game screen. Their club tags are visible, put next to the stream of code in the chat. Any fix on this? Thanks in advance.

replies.body:
It's a pretty common problem at the moment. Seems to be related to the globalisation of accounts, but it's a known issue. Everything's a little bit wonky with all the big changes that have come through (which is fairly normal for preseason).

No current workarounds that I'm aware of for that particular symptom, though a client repair or reinstall *might* help with some of it.
